name: Star Wars: Rogue Leaders - Rogue Squadron Wii
summary: Star Wars: Rogue Leaders - Rogue Squadron Wii is a cancelled compilation game for the Nintendo Wii by Factor 5. The game was set to have Star Wars: Rogue Squadron, Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II - Rogue Leader, and Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III - Rebel Strike. It was cancelled in 2008 after Factor 5 went out of business because of the 2007-2008 financial crisis.
